_header: We be maidens fair and gent
_description: The song of the light ladies — one or two quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘The bell-a the bell-a we maydins beryth the bell-a / we maydins berth the bell-a the bell-a the bell-a’

NYPLDrexFr4185.Transcription:
…bellaÞe bella we be cum f[ ][ ] entent our selfes
                    now for to sellA ssay you þen none of þe spycefor it wyll
                    make your [ ][ ] swellla the bell
NYPLDrexFr4185.Note:
Portions of pages cut away to fit as endleaves to seventeenth-century
                    song book.

Stevens,  John,
